name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
June 18, Nanning Metro. A subway attendant was molested in public by a drunk man.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 18, a video of traffic control in a certain place went viral on the Internet. In the video, more than 100 cars were stopped in the middle of the road by a traffic policeman, causing serious congestion at the intersection behind, just to allow a Toyota Coaster convoy to pass.
In the comment area, netizens expressed strong dissatisfaction

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Subsequent update
Currently, the more than 30,000 comments in the video have been cleared to only 41, and netizens wished "Keep going Huawei" in the comment section

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 15, a netizen posted a video saying that he encountered a white car several times while driving.
Then at an intersection, a man in black got out of the car and started arguing with the netizen after showing his police officer ID.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Afterwards, the policeman sent a private message to the blogger asking him to delete the video, but the blogger refused.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 18, on Kunming Metro Line 4, someone distributed a "protest letter" in the carriage, reporting that Li Shaoxiong, deputy mayor of Shuifu City, Yunnan Province, did not abide by the party spirit, did not perform his duties in accordance with the law, violated the provisions of impartial use of power and moral integrity, and abused his power during his tenure as secretary of the Taiping Town Party Committee.
